GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an array object including a comment_count for that review

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyeard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates reviews object using review_id, and will decrement/increment the current review's vote property by the value in object sent by user and then returns the updated

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array object of comments for the given `review_id`

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts an a comment object to the given `review_id`
